page.title: 02Farming in the area
page.content: Farming is the biggest employer in our area. Farms produce enough milk to supply the people in our area and enough to send away. The main crop is grass which is used for silage and the farms are mostly mixed.There is quite a lot of meat produced from the farms.Most of the farmhouses in the area are quite old but they are gradually being replaced by more modern buildings. Equipment is also being modernised for example herring bone milking parlours are now very popular.Hurdon Farm is quite a large farm near Launceston. It has a large amount of livestock including cows, sheep,and pigs.There are 5 farm labourers as well as the farmer and his family.They have 10 tractors ,3 silage harversters and a combine.
